Name: Basic Ball
Effects: +5 to your capture roll.

Name: Great Ball
Effects: +0 to your capture roll.

Name: Ultra Ball
Effects: -5 from your capture roll.

Name: Master Ball
Effects: -100 from your capture roll. The Master Ball can and will often fail when thrown at legendary Pokémon.

Name: Park Ball
Effects: -20 from your capture roll against domesticated wild Pokémon.

Name: Safari Ball
Effects: -20 from your capture roll against domesticated wild Pokémon.

Name: Sport Ball
Effects: -20 from your capture roll against domesticated wild Pokémon.

Name: Cherish Ball
Effects: -5 from your capture roll. Captured Pokémon are more easily befriended.

Name: Luxury Ball
Effects: -5 from your capture roll. Captured Pokémon are more easily befriended.

Name: Premier Ball
Effects: -5 from your capture roll. Captured Pokémon are more easily befriended.

Name: Dive Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if the Pokémon is in water.

Name: Dusk Ball
Effects: -7 from your capture roll if it’s night time (no sunlight).

Name: Fast Ball
Effects: -8 from your capture roll on a Pokémon that acts before your Pokémon.

Name: Lure Ball
Effects: -10 from your capture roll if you lured the wild Pokémon into combat.

Name: Quick Ball
Effects: -20 from your capture roll if thrown as your first action during combat.

Name: Repeat Ball
Effects: -10 from your capture roll the Pokémon already had a Poké Ball thrown at it this encounter.

Name: Timer Ball
Effects: -10 from your capture roll if the encounter has lasted at least one min; -25 from your capture roll if the en- counter has lasted at least two mins.

Name: Friend Ball
Effects: +0 to your capture roll. Captured Pokémon are more easily befriended.

Name: Heal Ball
Effects: +0 to your capture roll. Captured Pokémon are healed 20 hit points.

Name: Dream Ball
Effects: -10 from your capture roll if the Pokémon is afflicted.

Name: Heavy Ball
Effects: -15 from your capture roll if the Pokémon is Heavy or Superweight.

Name: Level Ball
Effects: -10 from your capture roll if the Pokémon can evolve, but is not evolved.

Name: Love Ball
Effects: -10 from your capture roll if the target is the opposite sex of your Pokémon.

Name: Moon Ball
Effects: -10 from your capture roll if the Pokémon evolves with an evolution stone.

Name: Nest Ball
Effects: -10 from your capture roll if the Pokémon can evolve, but is not evolved.

Name: Net Ball
Effects: -15 from your capture roll when used against a Bug or Water type Pokémon.

Name: Save Ball
Effects: -10 from your capture roll against an unconscious Pokémon. The Save Ball will not negatively affect the cap-tured Pokémon’s loyalty.

Name: Earth Ball
Effects: -15 from your capture roll when used against a Grass or Ground type Pokémon.

Name: Haunt Ball
Effects: -15 from your capture roll when used against a Dark or Ghost type Pokémon.

Name: Solid Ball
Effects: -15 from your capture roll when used against a Rock or Steel type Pokémon.

Name: Heat Ball
Effects: -15 from your capture roll when used against a Electric or Fire type Pokémon.

Name: Mystic Ball
Effects: -15 from your capture roll when used against a Dragon or Psychic type Pokémon.

Name: Air Ball
Effects: -15 from your capture roll when used against a Flying or Ice type Pokémon.

Name: Mold Ball
Effects: -15 from your capture roll when used against a Poison or Fighting type Pokémon.

Name: Fine Ball
Effects: -15 from your capture roll when used against a Normal or Fairy type Pokémon.

Name: Arctic Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within an Arctic environment.

Name: Mountain Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Mountain environment.

Name: Desert Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Desert environment.

Name: Grassland Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Grassland environment.

Name: Rainforest Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Rainforest environment.

Name: Forest Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Forest environment.

Name: Tundra Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Tundra environment.

Name: Taiga Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Taiga environment.

Name: Marsh Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Marsh environment.

Name: Beach Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Beach environment.

Name: Freshwater Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Freshwater environment.

Name: Urban Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within an Urban environment.

Name: Cave Ball
Effects: -12 from your capture roll if within a Cave environment.
